name: Dwarf Swordsman
description:
《Dwarf Swordsman》 is a first-person action adventure game with Chinese style architecture, beautiful environment, realistic model and action stimulation. The player is located in an occupied city, can use four kinds of melee weapons, wipe out all the enemy warriors in the city can win, the player needs to avoid the warrior's attack to avoid being hit, guarantee their health, eliminate all warriors!
WASD movement
Mouse wheel switch weapons
Mouse control lens
